dimension: 43 1/16 x 2 13/16 in. (109.38 x 7.14 cm) (without pompons or fringes)
title: Woman's belt
description: white; ends woven with chevrons and geometric bands and stripes in pink, black, and red; pink and green pompon balls at bottom with loose pink, red, and black threads at sides
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
